title: EXCLUSIVE: Facebook to shield users from EU data law
text:
EXCLUSIVE: Facebook tries to sidestep new EU privacy law 1:58am BST - 01:55 
Facebook is about to change its Terms of Service for 1.5 billion international users to move their jurisdiction out of Ireland and to the U.S. ahead of the launch of a strict new data protection law by the European Union.   
Facebook is about to change its Terms of Service for 1.5 billion international users to move their jurisdiction out of Ireland and to the U.S. ahead of the launch of a strict new data protection law by the European Union.  //reut.rs/2Hfq6JF
